languages.text: "Как погляжу, не я {mf|один|одна} предпочитаю держать оружие у подушки".
"I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."
languages.original_text: "Как погляжу, не я {mf|один|одна} предпочитаю держать оружие у подушки".

traits.locale_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."
"I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."
"Do you always sleep with your weapon?"
"I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."
"Do you always sleep with your weapon?"
"Do you always sleep with your weapon?"
"I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."
"I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

languages.text: « Je vois que je ne suis pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à garder une arme sous mon oreiller. »
languages.original_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que je ne suis pas {mf|le seul|la seule} à garder une arme sous mon oreiller. »
« Vous dormez toujours avec votre arme ? »
« Vous dormez toujours avec votre arme ? »

languages.text: 「枕元に武器を置いておくのが好きなのは、{mf|俺|私}だけではないようだな」
languages.original_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

traits.locale_text: 「枕元に武器を置いておくのが好きなのは、{mf|俺|私}だけではないようだな」
「いつも武器と一緒に寝ているのか？」
「いつも武器と一緒に寝ているのか？」

languages.text: «Veo que no soy {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que duerme con un arma bajo la almohada».
languages.original_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que no soy {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que duerme con un arma bajo la almohada».
«¿Duerme siempre con su arma?».
«¿Duerme siempre con su arma?».

languages.text: “看得出来，习惯把武器放在枕边的人并不只有我一个。”
languages.original_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，习惯把武器放在枕边的人并不只有我一个。”
“你总是随身带着武器睡觉吗？”
“你总是随身带着武器睡觉吗？”

languages.text: "Görüyorum ki yastığının altında silah tutmayı tercih eden bir tek ben değilmişim."
languages.original_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

traits.locale_text: "Görüyorum ki yastığının altında silah tutmayı tercih eden bir tek ben değilmişim."
"Hep silahınla mı uyursun?"
"Hep silahınla mı uyursun?"

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, schlafe nicht nur ich mit einer Waffe unter dem Kopfkissen."
languages.original_text: "I see I'm not the only one who prefers to keep a weapon close to their pillow."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, schlafe nicht nur ich mit einer Waffe unter dem Kopfkissen."
"Schlaft Ihr immer mit Eurer Waffe?"
